bugs.summary: RFE: Please update btrfs-progs to include command btrfs(8)

description: RFE: Please update btrfs-progs to include command btrfs(8)
solution:
Before applying this update, make sure all previously-released errata
relevant to your system have been applied.
This update is available via the Red Hat Network. Details on how to
use the Red Hat Network to apply this update are available at
https://access.redhat.com/knowledge/articles/11258
synopsis: btrfs-progs bug fix and enhancement update [rhn_live restricted]
topic:
Updated btrfs-progs packages that fix several bugs and add various enhancements
are now available.
